featured.text: The car was moving so fast that it went through the highway-dividing fence, resulting in a collision in which five people died.
According to Japan’s transport ministry, there were 613 cases of train services suspended or delayed for at least 30 minutes resulting from collisions with deer and other wild animals in 2016-17.

definition.zh_def: 碰撞，指兩個或多個物體相互撞擊的事件。
definition.en_def: A collision is an event where two or more objects strike each other.
definition.example: The car was damaged in the collision with the truck.
